3380/A0/07/001/001.headline: Despite successful efforts to maintain budget lines in 2016 budgeting exercise  UNICEF Congo  as other development partners  did not receive domestic funds disbursement in 2016. This situation resulted in important gaps in funding and has limited its capacity to adequately deliver on planned results.

3380/A0/07/001/001.status_value: As part of the preparation of the 2015 national budget  UNICEF and the Government had identified five joint projects that should have received government counterpart funds amounting to US $ 1 1 million. These projects were budgeted and included in 2015 national budget. Unfortunately  the disbursement of these funds has remained a major constraint. None fund has been disbursed due to the decline of oil revenues and change of government priorities.
